about_the_game:
·Game Description·

Having lost your memory, you wake up from an unfamiliar hospital bed, and look around to find that this place has long been deserted due to the outbreak of the virus in the early years. The sudden mysterious man tells you the current state of the world, and after being attacked by an unknown creature, your mind is blank and you choose to be cautious, so you follow the other party to the gathering place where there are still signs of human activity, intending to find out.

But if you stay in the shelter, you won't know what lies in the lost memories, and in order to find out what happened before the amnesia, you take the opportunity to go to the anomalous area with your partner to find out.

·Format of play·

This work is mainly in the form of a two-threaded story advancement, the player mainly controls the character "021" and the partner "Eden" to explore at the same time to understand the whole story, as the story develops, the subsequent chapters can also operate more characters to play.

The protagonist "021" is mainly responsible for the perspective exploration in memories, and the character "Eden" is mainly responsible for the perspective exploration in reality.

Because of the difference in time, even if you are in the same place, you can find different things, so try to summarize the information obtained from both and make your own judgment.

·Process overview·

There are seven chapters in the main line of this work, excluding the prologue at the beginning and the final chapter, and there are five major chapters in between.

Each major chapter will tell a different story, and each major chapter will be 2 to 3 hours long, and they will be independent of each other and can be viewed as a separate story, and the main story will be interspersed between these five chapters.

Each major chapter has a main perspective character, and the story of this chapter revolves around this character.

At the end of each major chapter, there is an important option that determines the direction of the ending, which is marked with a special color.

There are multiple endings in the game, and your choices determine what their endings are.

It takes about 10 hours to play the entire main story, so please pay attention to the playing time.

·Main characters·

Players will experience the flow of the game from the main perspective of the character "021".

You don't remember anything, try to remember the lost memories in the exploration.

Of course, you can also change your name in the game, or do you want to call it that?

This is the first person you see when you wake up, and I don't know why your first impression of him is "dangerous", but you feel that the other person is okay after getting along.

Eden is your regular companion when you're out on the go.

Loop is the person you meet in what is known as the Central Research Institute, and is responsible for gathering information from the Institute.

Almost every time you see Loop, he's busy with work.

Loop doesn't say much, but you don't get rejected if you offer to talk to him.

P· D is the robot you encounter in the "Central Research Institute", which is responsible for the security work of the research institute and the processing of information.

With an advanced artificial intelligence system, P· D prefers to be seen as a woman, so it's good to think of her as a normal girl.

Because the body is a machine, P· D has multiple spare bodies.

Xuanhuang is the main perspective character in the first chapter.

Xuanhuang has a sense of oldness that does not match his actual age, and is often complained by his teammates about being like an old man.

But the unexpected skills are very good, maybe because the body is very young.

Xiang Wanyang is the main perspective character in Chapter 2.

After getting along with her, you will find that she is a very cheerful person, but she is relatively cold to strangers.

Maybe it's because of her personality, she prefers to stay with girls.

The tower is the main perspective character in Chapter 3.

Ta always looked like she was in a daze, not knowing what was going on in her mind.

It's a bit of an airwave system.,Will occasionally say something unclear.,Maybe it's a lot easier to communicate with her radio waves.。

Xiang Wanyang can communicate with her very fluently, and you don't know what the principle is, maybe they are really on the airwaves.

Kim is the main perspective character in Chapter 4.

When you first met him, you thought you were about the same age, but you didn't expect that your age and appearance didn't match.

Very flamboyant, his brain spins quickly, and he often sees the wind and rudder, maybe this matches his age.

Xiang Wanyang actually doesn't like him very much, because she feels that Kim is always smirking and looks very insincere, and the two of them are a little bit uneasy, but they don't have conflicts and disobey the action plan because of this.

Evelyn is the main perspective character in Chapter 5.

Evelyn is a scientist who specializes in biological research.

Because she lost her eyesight after an accident, she was able to see with the help of technology.

·Precautions·

The names of people, places, and proper nouns appearing in this work are fictitious, and if they coincide with reality, they are all coincidences, so please do not associate the two.

The extreme content contained in the bad ending of this work does not represent the author's own values, so please do not bring it in.

This work contains elements such as Cthulhu, horror, psychological horror, extreme, exciting, distorted, gray, and human nature, so please end the game as soon as possible if you feel unwell.
